titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the circumstances under which the Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall provide reimbursement for emergency ambulance services.
Veterans Reimbursement for Emergency Ambulance Services Act
Veterans Reimbursement for Emergency Ambulance Services Act
VREASA
VREASA
Veterans Reimbursement for Emergency Ambulance Services Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
